sourcesContent:
// src/components/Mission21.js // Mission 21 page view import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../assets/styles/main2.css'; import Footer from './Footer'; const image = require('../assets/images/photo3.JPG'); function Mission21() { // use state for some clickable popups useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const scrollTop = window.scrollY; const maxScroll = document.body.scrollHeight - window.innerHeight; const scale = 3; // so that we can acheive the desired effect faster const minOpacity = 0.1; // minimum opacity value that I want const newOpacity = Math.max( minOpacity, 1 - Math.min((scrollTop / maxScroll) * scale, 1) ); const imageElement = document.querySelector('.poem-container img'); if (imageElement) { imageElement.style.opacity = newOpacity; // assigning the new opacity } // for h1 title with id poem-title const textShadow = '1px 1px 0px white, -1px 1px 0px white, 1px -1px 0px white, -1px -1px 0px white'; const titleElement = document.getElementById('poem-title'); if (titleElement) { titleElement.style.textShadow = newOpacity > 0.9 ? textShadow : 'none'; } // if opacity is less than 0.2, set the text in direction-text to ' ' const directionTextElement = document.getElementById('direction-text'); if (directionTextElement) { directionTextElement.style.opacity = newOpacity > 0.4 ? 1 : 0; } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (

Scroll Up ↑

Mission 21

Mission 21 | July 2024

“If we were to secretly date,
how long could we keep it up?”

‘I would say… 21 months
give or take.’

“And, your… our friends won’t find out?”

‘They might… after 21 months.’

“And, even your closest friend won’t notice?”

‘She won’t. But, when we tell her though,
she will act like she always knew.’

“I want to see that shock on her face.
Would be funny.”

‘She’s gonna be so mad I didn’t tell her though.’

“Would be funny.
...
So, do you want to be my boyfriend?
For at least 21 months anyway?”

‘Hmm… what are the perks?’

“You can lean on my shoulder on game nights.”

‘Only if you promise to act like you can’t care less.’

“Deal. I will also make you dinner…
if you want.”

‘I will help!’

“Sounds good.”

‘We can make up fake crushes
and talk about all the hottest girls in our classes.’

“We can sometimes disappear during hangouts and
exchange… kisses”

‘or blowjobs’

“Keep it classy, now.”

‘Sure. We can go on dates,
have dinner and drinks,
and climb into each other’s beds…
then, just stare at the ceiling
and draw maps of our future
that we are not sure exists.’

“I can act straight
and make them think
you can finally keep a close friend.”

‘I can write about us in my poems
and post them online.’

“As long as you change some information
to keep them doubting.”

‘Deal.’

“Deal.”

‘Then, I would say we have a mission
for about 21 months, give or take.’

“I am going to love you so much
and no one will interfere.”

‘I am going to write so much about you
and no one will know.’














); }; export default Mission21;
